east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

sentences.english: In the rain, a 11)blackbird was singing beautifully.
sentences.chinese: 在雨中，一只乌鸫正在鸣唱，歌声优美动听。

sentences.english: The singing voice of Japanese Thrush was heard in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 我听在森林里乌灰鸫的鸣叫了。

sentences.english: It resembles the American robin in general behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 其一般行为与美洲鸫相似。

sentences.english: I peep out at the throstles and blackbirds on the lawn, and my friend Cock Robin.
sentences.chinese: 我往外偷看歌鸫和黑鸫，还有我的朋友公鸡罗宾。

sentences.english: I peep out at the throstles and blackbirds on the lawn, and my friend Cock Robin.
sentences.chinese: 我往外偷看歌鸫和黑鸫，还有我的朋友公鸡罗宾。

sentences.english: An aged thrush, frail, gaunt and small.
sentences.chinese: 一只老鸫鸟，脆弱，削瘦，个小。

sentences.english: Ahermit thrush gulps down a wild berry to bulk up on antioxidants.
sentences.chinese: 一只鸫吞下野生的浆果来囤积抗氧化剂。

sentences.english: Blackbirds often nest in that bush.
sentences.chinese: 鸫鸟经常在那个灌木丛中筑巢。

sentences.english: Ye wild whistling blackbirds in yon thorny den.
sentences.chinese: 你呀，乌鸫，哨声在荆棘丛生的溪谷中鸣响。

sentences.english: A thrush alighted on a branch of the pine tree.
sentences.chinese: 一只鸫落在松树的树枝上。

sentences.english: Thrushes are a protected species so you will not find them on any menu .
sentences.chinese: 鸫鸟是受保护的物种，在菜谱上是找不到的。

sentences.english: In October, I saw about 10 of them gathering and flying together.
sentences.chinese: 十月，我看见大约10来只蓝矶鸫在空中齐聚翱翔。

sentences.english: A blackbird flew down and perched on the parapet outside his window.
sentences.chinese: 一只乌鸫飞下来，停在他窗外的矮墙上。

definition: the Pycnonotidae or bulbul family of birds

small bird/sparrow/also pr. [qiao3]
